text: Maavidaakulu () is a 1998 Telugu-language drama film, produced by J. Bhagawan and D.V.V. Danayya under the Sri Balaji Art Creations banner, directed by E.V.V. Satyanarayana and cinematography by Chota K. Naidu. It stars Jagapati Babu, Rachana in the lead roles and music composed by Koti. This film is Ravi Babu's debut as an artist. The film was received well and was a hit at the box office. ==Plot== Pratap (Jagapati Babu) & Priya (Rachana) works as creative heads in opponent T.V. Channels AAHA & OOHO respectively, they always have a tough clash. Both of them are divorced couple. Pratap has a daughter Puppy (Baby Upasana) & Priya has a son Babloo (Master Anand Vardhan), both of them are fed up with single parent love and they crave father and mother's love. So, Pratap & Priya decide act as their parents when Bapineedu (Kota Srinivasa Rao), Pratap's ex-father-in-law who wants to make remarriage to his son-in- law, plays a drama and shifts them to a single house. In this period of time, Pratap & Priya start loving each other. Rest of the story is how they get married. ==Cast== *Jagapati Babu as Pratap *Rachana Banerjee as Priya *Neelam as Keerti *Kota Srinivasa Rao as Bapineedu *Brahmanandam as Lavangam *Mallikarjuna Rao *M. S. Narayana *Tanikella Bharani as Oho TV owner *AVS as Aaha TV owner *Ravi Babu as Muddu Krishna *Kavya as Madhuri Dixit *Namala Murthy *Priya as anchor *Ayesha Jalil *Krishnaveni as Sundari *Ragini *Radha Prashanthi as teacher *Srinija *Sri Bhavani *Master Anand Vardhan as Babloo *Baby Upasana as Puppy ==Soundtrack== Music composed by Koti. title: Maavidaakulu
